aboutpara: I am a seasoned software engineer with over 10 years of experience in JavaScript & contemporary frameworks such as Vue and React. I have developed and integrated complex software solutions within cross-functional teams, enhancing the functionality and performance of SaaS platforms. With a strong foundation in modern development practices gained from my time at Flatiron School and hands-on roles at Pendo, JW Player, and other startups, I am adept at driving user-friendly, data-driven applications forward.

resume.description: I am a seasoned software engineer with over 10 years of experience in JavaScript& contemporary frameworks such as Vue and React. I have developed and integrated complex software solutions within cross-functional teams, enhancing the functionality and performance of SaaS platforms. With a strong foundation in modern development practices gained from my time at Flatiron School and hands-on roles at Pendo, JW Player, and other startups, I am adept at driving user-friendly, data-driven applications forward.

experiences.bullets: Developed and integrated a SFDC Knowledge Base system within the Pendo platform using the Pendo API; enhancing customer accessibility to knowledge articles and improving the in-app support experience with multilingual support., Bullet Two
